# kimtoma.com - Full Context for LLMs

> Personal blog and portfolio of Kyungsoo Kim (김경수), a Service Planner & Product Designer with 15+ years of experience in digital product design.

## Author Profile

### Basic Information
- Name: Kim Kyungsoo (김경수)
- Nickname: kimtoma
- Role: Service Planner, UX Designer, Product Manager
- Location: Pangyo, South Korea
- Email: kimtoma@gmail.com

### Philosophy
"쓸모 있으면서도 사람을 향한 서비스" (Services that are useful and human-centered)
"좋은 사람과 좋은 팀이 있어야 좋은 제품이 만들어진다" (Good products come from good people and good teams)

## Career History

### KT Corporation (2024.06 ~ Present)
- Position: Principal Researcher, Agentic AI Lab
- Focus: AI Agent Service Planning
- Organization: R&D Research Institute, Technology Innovation Division

### NCsoft (2020.03 ~ 2024.05)
- Position: Team Lead, Senior Product Manager, AI Product Team
- Achievement: Led PAIGE project (iF Design Award 2021)
- Focus: NLP/Streaming technology-based AI services

### H-Nine (2010.06 ~ 2020.02)
- Position: Team Lead, UX Design Manager
- Achievement: Led The Hunters project (iF Design Award 2020)
- Focus: Mobile apps, tablets, kiosks, robots UX design
- Clients: Samsung, SK, Daelim Construction, startups

## Awards

### iF Design Award 2021
- Category: Communication / App/SW
- Project: PAIGE - AI-powered KBO baseball content & community app
- URL: https://ifdesign.com/en/winner-ranking/project/paige/295159

### iF Design Award 2020
- Category: Communication / App/SW
- Project: The Hunters - Cryptocurrency-based reward mobile game
- URL: https://ifdesign.com/en/winner-ranking/project/mossland-the-hunters/274510

## Projects

### Main Projects
1. **PAIGE** (https://paige.kr.nc.com/)
   - AI-powered app for KBO Baseball fans
   - Features: AI content generation, community, baseball statistics
   - Award: iF Design Award 2021

2. **The Hunters**
   - Blockchain-based reward game
   - Platform: Mossland
   - Award: iF Design Award 2020

3. **Wenzi** (https://wenzi.io)
   - Marketplace for handmade classes & goods

### Side Projects
- **Momat Stickers**: LINE character stickers for foodies
- **Playlisteem**: Music playlist sharing on Steem blockchain
- **Translation Projects**: Smashing Magazine articles translated to Korean via Webactually

## Blog Topics

The blog covers:
- UX/UI Design (buttons, UI switches, color contrast, thumb zones)
- Design Tools (Abstract, Sketch, Figma)
- Project Management (Jira, retrospectives)
- Technology Trends (yearly trend analysis)
- AI & Machine Learning
- Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
- Personal Development & Teamwork

Confluence, Obsidian, Notion, GitHub, MS Office

Jira, Asana

### Design
Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Whiteboard, Post-it

### AI Tools
ChatGPT, Claude, Ollama, Cursor, Dify

### Communication
Slack, Teams, Discord

## Technical Details

### Site Architecture
- Framework: Jekyll 4.1.1
- Theme: Poole (customized with Dark/Light mode toggle)
- Hosting: GitHub Pages
- Domain: kimtoma.com (via Cloudflare)
- Analytics: Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Cloudflare Insights

### Features
- Bilingual content (Korean primary, some English)
- Dark/Light theme toggle with localStorage persistence
- Mermaid.js diagram support
- RSS/Atom feed
- SEO optimized with jekyll-seo-tag

## Content Language

Primary language is Korean (한국어). Some technical content and project descriptions are in English.

## Contact

For professional inquiries:
- Email: kimtoma@gmail.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kimkyungsoo/
